name: Gauntlet (itch) (gameswithfrank)
description:
Gauntlet was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1
It's a first person puzzle action game.

Controls: WASD to move. Right Mouse Button to slow time. Left Mouse Button to shoot. Space to jump. 

Others : M to toggle music. Double-tap Escape for Main Menu. 

Credits:

Karthik Vaddadi - Creator

Tools used: Unity, Playmaker, LMMS, Blender, GIMP
